definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
hydraulic bellows/water-driven ventilation (for metal smelting furnace)

sentences.english: If time is not pressing, sieges or neutralization will be likely options of choice.
sentences.chinese: 假按时分没有平静，也能够或许选择围攻或水力压抑。

sentences.english: It's an important development to apply magnetic field to hydrocyclones.
sentences.chinese: 把磁场应用于水力旋流器是近期研究的一个重要发展。

sentences.english: Heilongjiang river has the abundant water resources in boundary block, the engineering condition is superior.
sentences.chinese: 黑龙江干流界河段水力资源丰富，工程条件优越。

sentences.english: The conclusions can provide references for the field performance of hydrau- perforating and fracturing.
sentences.chinese: 实验结果可为水力射孔及压裂的现场施工提供参考。

sentences.english: This basic concept is illustrated in most texts on hyd aulics.
sentences.chinese: 这个基本概念在大多数水力学教科书中已有介绍。

sentences.english: Discusses the influence on valve authority of different hydraulic balance methods.
sentences.chinese: 本文还讨论了不同水力平衡措施对调节阀权度的影响。

sentences.english: Low water levels caused the country's largest hydropower dam to be shut down last month.
sentences.chinese: 上个月，低水位使得肯尼亚最大的水力大坝被迫关闭。

sentences.english: The adjusted increment method can change the trial method of hydraulic calculation into direct calculation.
sentences.chinese: 增量调整法可将水力计算中的试算变为直接计算。

sentences.english: A hydrocyclone device that removes large drill solids from the whole mud system.
sentences.chinese: 一种从整个泥浆系统中除去大钻屑的水力旋流装置。

sentences.english: The impeller and volute is the primary hydrodynamic parts, which influence the no clogging of sewage pump.
sentences.chinese: 叶轮和压水室是影响污水泵无堵塞性的主要水力部件。

sentences.english: It is the power behind a 880 megawatt hydroelectric generating station.
sentences.chinese: 它是一座880百万瓦水力发电站的主要动力来源。

sentences.english: In the19th century waterpower was widely utilized to generate electricity.
sentences.chinese: 在19世纪人们大规模使用水力来发电。

sentences.english: Therefore the study on fracturing fluid is the most important aspect of hydraulic fracturing .
sentences.chinese: 因此，压裂液的研究是水力压裂领域的最主要方面。

sentences.english: Authorities attributed this phenomenon to the country lacks water resources, hydroelectric power stations.
sentences.chinese: 当局将此现象归咎于该国水力发电站的水力资源缺乏。

sentences.english: Authorities attributed this phenomenon to the country lacks water resources, hydroelectric power stations.
sentences.chinese: 当局将此现象归咎于该国水力发电站的水力资源缺乏。

sentences.english: Stochastic hydraulics is a new development in the research of hydraulics.
sentences.chinese: 随机水力学是水力学研究的一个新发展。

definition: to generate electricity/to send a telegram
a forced draft (of wind, for smelting metal)/blast (in blast furnace)/bellows/to draw air using bellows
